chess.quote.draw.1: ü§ù "In chess, as in life, a man is his own most dangerous opponent." - Reuben Fine
chess.quote.draw.10: ‚è≥ "I don't believe in psychology. I believe in good moves." - Bobby Fischer
chess.quote.draw.2: ‚öñÔ∏è "The hardest game to win is a won game." - Emanuel Lasker
chess.quote.draw.3: üé≠ "There are two types of sacrifices: correct ones, and mine." - Mikhail Tal
chess.quote.draw.4: üåä "Chess is a sea in which a gnat may drink and an elephant may bathe." - Indian Proverb
chess.quote.draw.6: üéØ "Half the variations which are calculated in a tournament game turn out to be completely superfluous." - Jan Timman
chess.quote.draw.7: üí´ "A strong memory, concentration, imagination, and a strong will is required to become a great chess player." - Fischer
chess.quote.draw.9: üé® "Chess is the art of analysis." - Mikhail Botvinnik
chess.quote.loss.1: üí™ "Losing can persuade you to change what doesn't need to be changed, and winning can convince you everything is fine even if you are on the brink of disaster." - Garry Kasparov
chess.quote.loss.10: ‚ö° "You may learn much more from a game you lose than from a game you win." - Capablanca
chess.quote.loss.2: üå± "You must take your opponent into a deep dark forest where 2+2=5, and the path leading out is only wide enough for one." - Mikhail Tal
chess.quote.loss.3: üîÑ "Life is like a game of chess. To win you have to make a move." - Allan Rufus
chess.quote.loss.4: üìö "I have not given any drawn or lost games, because I thought them inadequate for the purposes of instruction." - Capablanca
chess.quote.loss.5: üé≤ "The blunders are all there on the board, waiting to be made." - Savielly Tartakower
chess.quote.loss.6: üåü "The mistakes are there, waiting to be made." - Savielly Tartakower
chess.quote.loss.7: üõ°Ô∏è "I prefer to lose a really good game than to win a bad one." - David Levy
chess.quote.loss.8: üå∏ "Even a poor plan is better than no plan." - Frank Marshall
chess.quote.loss.9: üéì "Every chess master was once a beginner who refused to give up." - Unknown
chess.quote.loss.fallback: üí™ Impara da questa partita e torna pi√π forte!
chess.quote.win.1: üëë "Every chess master was once a beginner." - Chernev
chess.quote.win.10: üé™ "Chess is the struggle against error." - Johannes Zukertort
chess.quote.win.2: ‚öîÔ∏è "Tactics is knowing what to do when there is something to do; strategy is knowing what to do when there is nothing to do." - Tartakower
chess.quote.win.3: üèÜ "The beauty of a move lies not in its appearance but in the thought behind it." - Nimzowitsch
chess.quote.win.4: üéØ "The winner of the game is the player who makes the next-to-last mistake." - Tartakower
chess.quote.win.5: ‚ôüÔ∏è "Even a poor plan is better than no plan at all." - Mikhail Chigorin
chess.quote.win.6: üî• "The threat is stronger than the execution." - Nimzowitsch
chess.quote.win.7: üíé "Discovered check is the dive bomber of the chessboard." - Reuben Fine
chess.quote.win.8: ‚≠ê "When you see a good move, look for a better one." - Emanuel Lasker
chess.quote.win.9: üåü "Play the opening like a book, the middle game like a magician, and the endgame like a machine." - Spielmann

disc.accuracy.text: Le stime nutrizionali si basano sull'analisi visiva e potrebbero non essere completamente accurate. Il contenuto nutrizionale effettivo pu√≤ variare in base ai metodi di preparazione, dimensioni delle porzioni e variazioni degli ingredienti.

weight.compare.100g: üçé √à il peso di una mela media! Continua cos√¨!
weight.compare.150g: ü•ù √à il peso di un kiwi! Bel progresso!

weight.compare.1_75kg: üëü Sono come 3 paia di scarpe da corsa! Sprint verso il successo!
weight.compare.1kg: üéÇ √à un chilo intero - come un sacco di farina! √à ora di festeggiare!
weight.compare.200g: üçå √à il peso di una banana! Stai andando alla grande!

weight.compare.400g: ü•≠ √à il peso di un mango! Formidabile!
weight.compare.450g: ü•î √à il peso di una patata! Superbo!
weight.compare.4kg: üë∂ √à quasi il peso di un neonato! Viaggio incredibile!
weight.compare.500g: üßà √à mezzo chilo - come un panetto di burro! Wow!
weight.compare.50g: ü•ö √à il peso di un uovo grande! Ottimo inizio!
weight.compare.550g: ü•• √à il peso di una noce di cocco! Straordinario!
weight.compare.5kg: üé≥ Progresso incredibile! √à come una palla da bowling! üèÜ

weight.compare.650g: üçá √à il peso di un grappolo d'uva! Eccellente!
weight.compare.700g: üçà √à il peso di un melone piccolo! Meraviglioso!
